title: Grandmother's Herbs Liqueur - Fluxa Ibiza
description: La Abuela Fluxá's herbal liqueur is made with herbs as they have been made by grandparents all their lives; in this case it is a tribute to our grandmother
cleaned_text: Description La Abuela Fluxá's herbal liqueur is made with herbs as they have been made by grandparents all their lives; in this case it is a tribute to our grandmother Catalina. The aromatic native plants are collected from our garden, with personal blend and the necessary
